programme.title: Wildest Africa: Okavango: Water in the Desert

programme.title: Wildest Middle East: Jordan: Nature's Furnace

programme.title: Wildest Islands: Japan: Islands of Extremes

programme.title: Wildest Africa: Nile: An African Odyssey

programme.title: Wildest India: Thar Desert: Sacred Sands

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Into Thin Air

programme.title: Sensing Murder: The Patient Killer
programme.desc: In 1976, thirteen-year-old schoolgirl Tracey Ann Patient was plucked off Auckland's Great North Road. The following morning, her body was found dumped 16 km away in the Waitakere Ranges, having been strangled with a pantyhose tourniquet.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Out of the Dark

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Where There's Smoke
programme.desc: In 2006, 19-year-old Blake Stott died in a mysterious car fire. Blake had seemingly pulled into a South Otago lay-by to have a sleep, when his late-model, un-modified car burst into flames.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Anita Cobby Murder
programme.desc: In February 1986, nurse Anita Cobby, a former entrant in the Miss Australia quest, is walking home from Blacktown station in Sydney's outer-western suburbs. A Holden sedan pulls up and Anita is dragged into the vehicle.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: A Killer Amongst Us: The Norfolk Island Murder
programme.desc: On Easter Sunday 2002, on sleepy Norfolk Island in the south west Pacific, the body of 29-year-old Janelle Patton was found lying in an open field.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Gonzales Family Murders
programme.desc: On July 10, 2001, Sef Gonzales murdered his sister Clodine, 18, mother Mary Loiva Josephine, 43, and his father Teddy, 46, in their North Ryde home.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Snowtown: Bodies in the Barrels
programme.desc: In 1999, eight bodies are found in six barrels filled with acid in a former bank vault in rural Snowtown, 50 kilometres north of Adelaide.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters
programme.desc: Meg‚Äôs sister, Celia Rivers (Glenda Linscott), arrives at Drovers. Partly apprehensive, partly excited, Meg has always lived in the shadow of her glamorous, talented, singing sister. But Celia has arrived for a sea-change, or a country change.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters
programme.desc: Meg is full of preparations for her and Jodi‚Äôs leave taking, and in her excitement fails to notice that Jodi is harbouring a sliver of doubt.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters
programme.desc: The Bachelor and Spinsters Ball, five hours drive from Gungellan, is one of the major social events on the country calendar.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters
programme.desc: Stevie‚Äôs daughter Rose (Basia A‚Äôhern) turns up at Drovers unexpectedly. She‚Äôs run away from her Mum to live with her Aunty Stevie.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters
programme.desc: The weekend of Stevie and Alex‚Äôs rodeo school has finally arrived and they are excited with the prospect of turning their fresh faced students into rodeo stars.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters
programme.desc: A minor car accident at the truckstop brings Stevie and Kane Morgan (Craig McLachlan) together for the first time. Stevie, at fault, is smitten by this handsome stranger when he tells her not to worry about the damage to his car.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: There Ghosts The Neighborhood
programme.desc: TAPSis called out to Joplin, Missouri to help 3 generations of afamilyliving on one haunted estate! Could both houses on the property harbor entities that couldbring harm to their children?

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: The Plot Thickens
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, owners of a haunted theatre in Woonsocket, Rhode Island buy the building next door and activity spikes! TAPS investigates both buildings to see if spirits are traveling between the two locations.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Fortress of Phantoms

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Hunt for Santa
programme.desc: Dog decides he needs to help his son Garry believe in Santa Claus again. So now the Dog, with a posse expanded to include his children and grandchildren, sets off on a hunt through the Colorado Rockies for Santa Claus himself!

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Call Waiting
programme.desc: Dog's target for today has been in trouble with the law since he was a juvenile. And he seems willing to use any trick in the system to avoid capture by Dog. In this match of wits, will Dog prevail?

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Kid Stuff
programme.desc: A fugitive from justice is on the lam and it's Dog's job to find him. When they hit the last known address they discover he already has pulled up stakes and left no forwarding address. The posse's one hope is to locate his girlfriend.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Easy Does It
programme.desc: There is a running joke in the posse that every time Bobby Brown asks them for help with a fugitive, he always promises them it's "an easy one," but the hunts end up being epic searches.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Ghost Rider
programme.desc: Dog believes in safety first, and today's hunt puts this philosophy to the test. The fugitive's problem with anger management increases the dangers of their already risky line of work. Dog warns the crew to be ready for anything as they head out.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Back in the Hood
programme.desc: Today, Dog's bounty is about to take him on a trip down memory lane and test his investigative chops. With each lead propelling him closer and closer to his childhood haunts, Dog uses old-fashioned detective skills to track his prey.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: One for the Road
programme.desc: Dog is a big-hearted guy. He's helping Mary Ellen, his friend and fellow bondsman, on a dangerous night hunt for a fugitive she is now regretting bailing out. He's also giving his nephew Justin a second chance to rejoin the team.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Bait and Switch
programme.desc: Things are seldom what they seem in the world of bounty hunting. When the fugitive's girlfriend offers to help Dog trap this dangerous felon, Dog knows that someone is being deceived. The only question is, whom?

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: True Identity
programme.desc: Dog knows that looks can be deceiving. The fugitive is pretty, petite, and trouble. She stands accused of settling an argument with the help of a box cutter. What Dog does not anticipate is how deceptive this femme fatale can truly be!

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Father Knows Pest
programme.desc: The tables are turned when the HOA comes to Jase for help to rid the neighborhood of a menacing beaver. Little Will has just gotten his learner's permit, and Willie and Si argue over which of them is the better driving instructor.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Wild Wild West Monroe
programme.desc: When Jase and Jep get into an argument over which of them is the rightful heir to their grandfather's old rifle, they decide to settle the argument with a marksmanship contest. Meanwhile, Willie and Korie help Rebecca prepare for her trip to Taiwan.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Half in the Bag
programme.desc: After Si has started moonlighting as a grocery bagger, the guys show up at the store and their teasing inadvertently causes Si to lose his job and his chance to enter a local bagging competition.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: There Will Be Flood
programme.desc: When a large storm hits Monroe, most of the adults head to Phil and Kay's to help protect their house from flooding while Jess, Sadie, Rebecca and Cole babysit the kids. Meanwhile, Jep, Si, Martin and Godwin try to protect the Duck Commander.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Bingo Star
programme.desc: Willie accompanies Kay to a local bingo tournament and gets seduced by the game, eventually embarrassing himself and Kay with his enthusiasm.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Sadie's Choice
programme.desc: Willie takes Sadie on a tour of a local college in hopes of convincing her to stay nearby after her impending high school graduation.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Children of the Cornbread
programme.desc: When the Robertson brothers debate which of their wives makes the best cornbread, it escalates into a full-on cornbread cook off. Meanwhile, when Jep, Martin, and Godwin play a practical joke on Uncle Si, it ends up being Si who has the last laugh.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Whole Lotta Bull
programme.desc: The guys enjoy a one-day rodeo fantasy camp where they learn the ins and outs of riding, roping and clowning.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Here Comes the Son
programme.desc: After leaving school to pursue music, Jase feels that Reed needs some structure in his life, so he hires him to take his place at Duck Commander.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Bro'd Trip
programme.desc: Jase accompanies Willie on a business trip to Arkansas to pitch a new product and has unorthodox sales strategies. Back in Monroe, Jep and Si have to track down an important item of Willie's that they accidentally shipped out.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Willie thinks his kids have been spending too much time on their phones and other devices so he initiates a "No-Tech Week," but when he has to participate too it ends up being harder than he thought. There's a lice outbreak at Duck Command.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: A Helping Hand
programme.desc: Dog answers two very different calls for help from women. In the first case, he helps Leland protect Maria, who's being threatened by her violent husband. Then Dog visit a young woman who's dying and has asked to see Dog as one of her final wishes.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Take Your Daughter to Work Day
programme.desc: Baby Lyssa, who's just turned 18 and is studying to become a bondsman, gets to do some on-the-job training when she helps Dog hunt for Wayne, who's run out on a bond for second-degree assault.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: In Sickness and In Health
programme.desc: Dog is sick as a dog, but he still must lead the hunt for a fugitive named James. James' girlfriend tries to cover for him, but Dog surprises James in his bedroom and leads him away in cuffs.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: If the Shirt Fits...
programme.desc: Beth buys Dog a shirt with an embroidered chicken, but Dog explains he only wears shirts with pictures of either Jesus or a Harley-Davidson. When it's time to go to work, the team goes after Necia, a fugitive with felony charges pending.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Thief Who Stole Christmas
programme.desc: It's Christmas day, and Dog sets out to nab Raymond, who robs to support his ice habit, and give him a little Christmas gift - shiny new handcuffs.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Rock-a-Bye Bounty
programme.desc: Dog and Beth must go after their former housekeeper, Lisa, who's jumped bond. They know this case will be tricky because Lisa knows everyone in the family. Luckily, Beth's nephew, Jason, is visiting and is quickly put to work as the bait.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Father-Hood
programme.desc: Before Tim heads out for a tough day of bounty hunting, he likes to get in a little quality time with his daughter, Summer Rain.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Cops and Criminals
programme.desc: After giving a rousing speech to an audience of enthusiastic grade-schoolers, Dog catches up with an old friend, Sheriff Tommy Cayetano, to talk business. Dog's got a tough fugitive, named Mia, to catch and Tommy is happy to lend a hand.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Cupid in Cuffs
programme.desc: It's the day before Valentine's Day and love is in the air at Da Kine Bail Bonds--but not for Tapi who has failed to appear in court on theft charges. Dog's plan is to have Leland knock on Tapi's door with a Valentine's gift to draw her out.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Bonds of Love
programme.desc: Dog and Beth are finally getting married! They've been together for more than ten years but Dog is determined, as he puts it, to "marry his common law wife the Christian way."

programme.title: NEW Half & Half: The Big Credit Check Episode
programme.desc: Mona gets upset when her boss, Kai, seems to take all the credit for the Delicious Records talent search. However Kai explains that she will have to take the fall if the promotion fails, so she has to take control.

programme.title: NEW Half & Half: The Big Fast Track Episode, Part I
programme.desc: Mona has trouble getting producers to judge the Delicious Talent contest that she is overseeing and Dee Dee loses the position she thought she had at her law firm.

programme.title: NEW Half & Half: The Big Fast Track Episode, Part II
programme.desc: Mona has trouble getting producers to judge the Delicious Talent contest that she is overseeing and Dee Dee loses the position she thought she had at her law firm.

programme.title: NEW Half & Half: The Big Undercover Episode
programme.desc: After Mona discovers Dee Dee has secretly gotten back together with her older exboyfriend Carter, she is disappointed that Dee Dee didn‚Äôt trust her enough to tell her.

programme.title: NEW Half & Half: The Big Doormat No More Episode
programme.desc: After telling Mona not to let people take advantage of her, Dee Dee later regrets giving her that advice when she asks Mona a favor and is turned down.

programme.title: NEW Half & Half: The Big Who's Wooing Who? Episode
programme.desc: When Mona is courted and gets a job offer from another record label, she has to make a choice between staying at Delicious Records or moving on. Meanwhile, in order to keep up with the Jones‚Äô, Big Dee Dee plans an extravagant birthday party for Drew.

programme.title: NEW Half & Half: The Big Thorne In My Side Episode
programme.desc: When Phyllis gets into trouble with her Homeowner's Association, Dee Dee comes to her defense, but ends up causing more harm than good.

programme.title: NEW Half & Half: The Big Pomp And Circumstance Episode
programme.desc: Dee Dee starts to feel the pressure as her law school graduation fast approaches and she hasn't landed a job. Meanwhile, Mona panics when Phyllis finds a terrific apartment in her neighborhood.

programme.title: Girlfriends: Where Did Lynn-Digo?
programme.desc: When Lynn meets Xander, a cute student at UCLA, he asks her to perform at a rally raising awareness to save the environment. But when Lynn's manager gets her a gig at the House of Blues for the same day, she must decide where she will perform.

programme.title: Girlfriends: Losing It
programme.desc: Maya tries to avoid calls from her publisher when she experiences writer's block and is unable to complete her third book.

programme.title: Girlfriends: Good Grief
programme.desc: When Maya accuses Darnell of blaming her for the miscarriage, Joan and Lynn are worried that Maya is in denial and not allowing herself to grieve.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Haunted Connection
programme.desc: P.R.S. is called in to help a young mother tormented by an otherworldly connection to a teenage girl murdered in her neighborhood years ago. Could she have psychic ability or is there a more sinister force at work?

programme.title: Paranormal State: Family Ties
programme.desc: Jimmie is haunted by the apparition of a mysterious old woman who peers at him in the bathroom of his family's Petersburg, VA home.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Requiem
programme.desc: A young woman named Kristy has been haunted in her own bedroom since she can remember. Now it's up to Ryan and the crew to help Kristy before she's overwhelmed by the entity.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Vendetta
programme.desc: P.R.S. investigates claims of supernatural revenge in the Pennsylvania Poconos. When a client's new boyfriend moves in, does the paranormal move in with him? Or did her ex put a hex on her house and the entire family?

programme.title: Paranormal State: Hostage to Fear
programme.desc: P.R.S. is summoned to help a family who has been haunted for years by spirits lurking in the house. Upon arrival the team finds a family that has become prisoners in their own home.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Basement
programme.desc: A history of violence may connect the spiritual activity in Heidi's Ohio home to a long run of misery and cruelty.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Desperate Households
programme.desc: When Julie and her family moved into their dream home in suburban New Jersey they quickly realized they were not alone.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Satan's Soldier
programme.desc: Mark and Kim can't sleep through the racket caused by unseen forces in their central Indiana home. When PRS and Psychic/Medium Michelle Belanger discover what appears to be blood in the basement, they investigate a history of violence in the home.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Boy Pushed Me
programme.desc: Bruce and Danielle are terrified by an EVP recorded in their Indiana home stating "Kill them." Even more chilling, their toddler son survived a fall out of a window only to tell his parents, "Boy pushed me."

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Name
programme.desc: Ryan Buell and company set out on one of their most dangerous cases to date - to help a single mother who is experiencing paranormal activity in a home that was once the site of brutal murder.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Fort Paull Part 1
programme.desc: Part 1 of this terrifying place concentrates above ground. The team are alarmed at the results from a new piece of equipment and Yvette meets her match.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Fort Paull Part 2
programme.desc: Part 2. The Most Haunted team explore the underground of Fort Paull. With its foundations and footprint dating back 100‚Äôs of years the team are faced with some terrifying ordeals.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Annison Funeral Parlour
programme.desc: Coffins, murder and a malevolent spirit plague the team as they investigate this one-time funeral home. With one member isolated alone another in a coffin the team catch a poltergeist in action

programme.title: Most Haunted: Wentworth Woodhouse Part 1
programme.desc: Part 1. The upper floors of Wentworth House are a maze of corridors and rooms and the team have one night to investigate as many as possible. With one whistling spirit, groans and loud noises the team are shaken to their core.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Wentworth Woodhouse Part 2
programme.desc: Part 2. The underbelly of this great house is a sharp contrast to its upper grandeur. Some members of the team are forced to run while other are lost in the labyrinth of tunnels and passageways pursued by something unnatural.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Oakwell House
programme.desc: The team investigate Oakwell House near Leeds, which was built by ancestors of Fred Batt. In 1684, William Batt returned unexpectedly from a trip to London but vanished leaving a bloody footprint. A demon dog has been seen in the grounds.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: The Monster - Part 2
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark's friend Scotty is on hand to provide legal assistance. He defends the young artist with a facial deformity who has been accused of assaulting a blind girl.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: The Good Doctor
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark go to work at a football team. They learn that one of the players has been getting drugs from the team doctor.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Alone
programme.desc: A homeless boy wishes that someone would love him.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Close Encounters of the Heavenly Kind
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark help a bullied orphan whose eccentric grandfather is in danger of losing him to a heartless social worker.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Change of Life
programme.desc: Mark switches places with an attractive movie star who has a low opinion of men.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Keep Smiling
programme.desc: Jonathan must help his own widow regain her love for life.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 1
programme.desc: While on honeymoon in London, Alice discovers that Danny has some final business to do before they can return home to Africa. He's reluctantly arranged to meet his estranged father, Robert, who has recently got back in touch.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 2
programme.desc: Danny is throwing himself into his work after the death of his father, and has applied for the role of State Vet. However, Danny's attempts to involve Thabo in the first phase of the Lion Breeding Project lead to Du Plessis feeling like an outsider.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 3
programme.desc: It is Danny's first day as State Vet and when he helps rescue some smuggled animals he feels he's making a difference. However, he discovers the role isn't going to be all plain sailing.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 4
programme.desc: Danny's first big project as State Vet is a major animal translocation, and he is desperate to impress. Meanwhile, whilst Alice is out in the bush treating an injured zebra, she is stalked by lions. She makes it back to her jeep in time but is shaken up.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 5
programme.desc: Alice is still suffering from a loss of nerve after her close shave with the lions and so Danny tries to help her overcome her problems ‚Äì the Leopard's Den lions have produced their first cub and he needs Alice back in the saddle.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 6
programme.desc: In his role as State Vet, Danny works with wealthy conservationist, Anton Ziegler, to catch a group of leopard hunters. Ziegler is also buying a tiger from Vanessa, who struggling with her finances, desperately needs the money to ensure Mara's future.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Bad Things Come in Threes
programme.desc: When two young mothers are gunned down behind a crowded bar, Kenda has to first determine who was the intended target and who was collateral damage.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Where is Claudia Jane
programme.desc: 15-year old CJ Bates is reported missing, and Kenda must investigate the mysterious circumstances behind disappearance of the teenager.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Blood From A Stone
